chinese: n.敬重，尊敬v，尊敬，敬重
english: respect

chinese: 他们互相鞠躬来表达尊重。
english: They showed respect to each other by bowing

chinese: n. 数据库
english: database

chinese: 他在数据中心工作，负责维护数据库。
english: He works in the data center and maintains the database

chinese: 1.囚犯；（精神病院等中的）被收容者
english: inmate

chinese: 这个囚犯正被带去他的牢房。
english: This inmate is being taken to his cell

chinese: adj.卫生的
english: hygienic

chinese: 她正在电梯里喷洒消毒剂以保持其干净卫生。
english: She is spraying disinfectant in the elevator to keep it clean and hygienic

chinese: ad）.海岸的
english: coastal

chinese: 在这条沿海公路上可以看到美丽的山海景色。
english: This coastal road has wonderful views of the mountains and the sea

chinese: ad）.主要的，占优势的
english: dominant

chinese: 这家公司占有80%的市场份额，在市场上具有举足轻重的地位。
english: The firm achieved a dominant position by occupying 80% of the market share

chinese: adv. 现在，目前
english: currently

chinese: 五年前，他只是个服务员，但现在他已经成了一位成功的商人。
english: Five years ago, he was just a waiter, but currently, he is a successful businessman

chinese: n.绝缘体，绝热器
english: insulator

chinese: 电线应该包裹在绝缘体中，比如橡胶。
english: Wires should be covered in an insulator like rubber

chinese: n.概率：差异，不平等
english: odds

chinese: 抽中奖的概率极低，大概是百万分之一。
english: The odds of winning the prize draw is extremely low, around a million to one

chinese: n.离婚，离异v离婚
english: divorce

chinese: 这对夫妻已经同意离婚了。
english: The couple have agreed to get a divorce

chinese: v.使遭受（损伤、痛苦等）
english: inflict

chinese: 他的病令他的胃部遭受着尖锐的疼痛。
english: His illness inflicted sharp pain on his stomach

chinese: n.边缘；边界以接近；濒临
english: verge

chinese: 路的边缘长满了可爱的蓝色花朵。
english: The verge of the road is covered with lovely blue flowers

chinese: v.预言，预告，预测
english: predict

chinese: 他预测这只股票过几天会涨。
english: He predicted this stock will experience an increase in a few days

chinese: v.支撑，承受
english: sustain

chinese: 这把椅子快承受不住你的重量了！
english: The chair can't sustain your weight anymore

chinese: n.非凡的才智；才华出众的人
english: intellect

chinese: 同学们对他过人的智力感到惊讶。
english: His classmates were all surprised by his considerable intellect

chinese: n.圣堂，避难所
english: sanctuary

chinese: 他的教堂成了数干位民众逃离内战的避难所。
english: His church became a sanctuary for thousands of people who fled the Civil War
